section.p: You can export a markup table to give it to other users, for example, other translators who must use the same modified markup table in their translation environment.
Markup tables can only be exported in external format.

Each markup tag described in the markup table is exported together with its nondefault data. You can find a table that contains the definition of markup table SGML tags and the data defaults that are used for in .

ul.li: The Markup Table List window must be active.
The markup table to be exported must be selected.

section.p: The selected markup table is exported to the specified file and saved on the selected drive and directory.
